short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Productivity Boost provides easy access to productivity enhancing tools via a widget on your toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get easy access to time-saving productivity tools with the Productivity Boost extension. 

How to use the productivity tools:
- Click the puzzle icon on the toolbar, then click on Productivity Boost to access the widget
- Create daily and monthly events on the calendar 
- Use the calculator for simple arithmetic
- Create daily to-do lists 
- Jot down information on notes
- View international time on the world clock

Want to share feedback? Please fill out this form and help us improve the product for you: https://productivityboost.net/public/contactus_cc.html 

You can uninstall this product at any time. Please follow the instructions here: https://productivityboost.net/public/uninstall_cc.html
